library(glmnet)

## Submodels vs full models

```{r}
n <- 100
Z <- rnorm(n)
X1 <- rnorm(n)
X2 <- 2*X1 + Z
Y <- 3*X1 + 1.5*X2 + rnorm(n)

summary(lm(Y~X1+X2))
```

```{r}
summary(lm(Y~X1))
```


```{r}
c(cor(Y,X1), cor(Y,X2))
```

```{r}
summary(lm(Y~X2))
```
